txt.en: Soldier Fandmau needs stone to repair the holes blasted through the walls of Tirith Rhaw and sent you to find the materials from the trolls caught in the sun.

'Guarding this post makes me nervous. So close to the enemy and trolls bashing holes through the stone. We need to shore the walls here and fast.\n\n'Get stone from the dead trolls throughout the Ettenmoors and return them to me. No stone is too small!'

Trolls that have been turned to stone by the sun are scattered throughout the Ettenmoors.\n\nSoldier Fandmau tasked you with obtaining a fair number of large to small bits of troll-stone to repair the walls of Tirith Rhaw.

'I'd build a wall if I could to keep the enemy from getting into our halls. We should be more defensible. Higher walls, larger tower...more trolls!!!\n\n'You did well, [placeholder]. I will speak well of you for a time.'
'What is this? Coming back to me empty handed!? Sluggards like you are why we run the risk of assault from everwhere!? Get out there and get me what I need.'
Return to Soldier Fandmau at Tirith Rhaw
